item.title: Tip 319 - How to create custom handlers for Azure Functions
item.description: Azure Functions (opens new window) are great for running serverless pieces of code. Functions also provide triggers and bindings (opens new window), which make it easy to start a function, receive data and do something with that data, without writing plumbing code. You could already create Azure Functions in many languages, and now with Custom Handlers (opens new window), you can have a Function trigger any type of code.

item.title: Always be quitting - jmmv.dev
item.description: A good philosophy to live by at work is to &ldquo;always be quitting&rdquo;. No, don&rsquo;t be constantly thinking of leaving your job 😱. But act as if you might leave on short notice 😎. Counterintuitively, this will make you a better engineer and open up growth opportunities. A thread 👇.

item.title: Bink Video and Bink Audio now available in Unreal Engine for free!
item.description: Bink Video is a cross-platform performance-oriented video codec that can decode 4K video frames in less than one millisecond and Bink Audio is a performance-oriented audio codec that is capable of perceptually lossless 10:1 compression.
